thread.section_title: The Goring - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beyond Expectations
thread.title_full: Beyond Expectations - Review of The Goring, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: David A
title: Beyond Expectations
text:
Every little detail was considered and the staff throughout achieved the perfect balance between friendliness and familiarity. Outstanding.
Pot of tea was delivered to our room at 2am by a fully liveried waiter and it was so unexpected and impressive that we nearly re-ordered.
Breakfast was very well presented and we went about our travels as 'happy little vegemites' Australian for being happy!
